title: deengfi
author: deengfi
content: A DApp where you can easily lock liquidity. How to lock liquidity on PancakeSwapEnter the liquidity locker appConnect with your MetaMask wallet. Paste the contract address of the liquidity LP or token you want to lock. Then click on the "New Lock" option. Enter the amount and duration you want to lock. "Approve" first and wait for the transaction to be confirmed. Then lock it. That is all. You can see your vaults in the "My Locks" section. You can share the link of your vault certificate with your investors on your social media accounts or on your website.For video explanation: https://youtu.be/p8O-Ru8oJHwcontact@cedilla.network
